name: Bring Real Hip Hop Back
blurb: I am working extremely hard to create my debut album and restore hip hop back too its glory days, using memorable content and lyrics.

name: The Banished Craft: A Fantasy Tale of Dragons and Wizards
blurb: Fantasy author E.D.E. Bell begins the saga of a split world, dragons, and lost magic in a new fantasy trilogy.

name: Lords of Gossamer and Shadow: Diceless Role-Playing
blurb: Lords of Gossamer & Shadow is a stand alone game using Erick Wujcik's diceless rules system which powered Amber Diceless Role-Playing.

name: Red Hot Rebellion II Comic Book & Concept Album
blurb: A full-length comic book AND concept album about a band of intergalactic heroes out to save Earth with the power of rock 'n' roll.

profile.blurb: A 60-page comic book AND 13-song concept album about a band of intergalactic heroes out to save Earth with the power of rock 'n' roll.
profile.name: "The Mission", a 60-page comic book & 13-song album.

name: Conjoynts - A Creative Wooden Building Toy
blurb: Interlocking 2D shapes that can be assembled to create 3D objects. Build anything you can imagine!

name: Paranormal: The Town
blurb: Experience the horror of a haunted town that's never the same twice. Found-footage horror gaming taken to the next level.

name: ERAS: Parrish Mini Comic
blurb: Raising money to print ERAS: Parrish, a mini comic, and to prepare for our next larger comic.

name: Twist Cupcakery
blurb: Twist Cupcakery needs your help launching our gourmet Cupcakery in Downtown Dayton

name: Not Our Kind: Tales of (Not) Belonging - New Fiction Stories
blurb: A genre-defying diverse collection of  fantasy and sci-fi stories of cultures, their problems, and seeing life from a new point of view

name: Chasing Phantoms: Six Songs in Six Weeks
blurb: In order to maintain my creative productivity this summer, I'll be recording a new original song each week for six weeks.

name: Spot360 | Illuminated, Reflective, & Fluorescent Dog Vest
blurb: Stylish and Based on Visual Science with 360° of Multicolor, Eye-Catching Illumination.  Another Great Innovation by Noxgear.

name: Furries: A Documentary about the Furry Fandom
blurb: A documentary exploring identity, creativity, and community—the human part of being 'furry'.

name: Kaidan Campaign Setting (PFRPG)
blurb: A Japanese horror dark fantasy campaign setting for the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game.

name: Laravel ElePHPant
blurb: Support the Laravel project and show that you love PHP with the Laravel ElePHPant.  Add Liona to your collection!

name: Steampunk World: A multicultural steampunk fiction anthology
blurb: A diverse steampunk anthology from your favorite award-winning authors, including Jay Lake, Nisi Shawl, Ken Liu, and Lucy A. Snyder.
